title: miguelik
author: miguelik
content: Hello, I want to buy old miners of around 6TH - 20TH , for a power consumption of 600w to 1.4KW or similar, with or without PSU.MOQ around 20 miners If you are a mining farm and want to sell a large quantity of miners, let me know!Shipping to Spain

comments.author: akaros
comments.body: Hello,i see you want 6-20TH/0,6-1,4kW/per unit but i try to offer you, Antminers S17+ 73TH i have 50pcs but only about 20pcs in 100% condition. PSU is mounted - included in miner. If you are interested just PM me. Price per unit is about 500usd or you can offer.
